name: 楊詠荍
objective: This course is a basic topics of Materials Science.
schedule:
Introduction to the course
Materials selection, Design and Performance
Introduction to Reverse Engineering
Crystallographic and Diffraction Techniques, and others..
Dislocations and strengthening mechanisms
Mid term exam
Application and processing of metal alloy
Optical properties of Solids (I,II)
Introduction to Biomaterials Science and Engineering
Issues with respect to biomaterials
Final exam
materials: An Introduction, W.D. Callister, Jr. and D.G. Rethwisch, 10th edition, John Wiley and Sons, Inc. (2018).
consultation: Please contact me at vicki.yeung@mail.ntut.edu.tw if you have any questions.
remarks: Virtual classes by using TEAMS will be adopted depending on the status of pandemics.  Details will be announced accordingly
